title: MOM'S SPANISH RICE RECIPE
directions: In a large skillet, cook beef, onion and pepper over medium heat 6-8 minutes or until beef is no longer pink and onion is tender, breaking up beef into crumbles; drain.
Stir in tomato sauce, tomatoes and seasonings; bring to a boil. Add rice; heat through, stirring occasionally. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (14-1/2 ounces) no-salt-added diced tomatoes, drained
